stability 0.5.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Modified Additive Main Effects and Multiplicative Interacion Stability Value

stab_masv.Rd

Additive ANOVA for Genotypes by Environment Interaction (GEI) model

stab_masv(.data, .y, .rep, .gen, .env, .m = 2)

# S3 method for default
stab_masv(.data, .y, .rep, .gen, .env, .m = 2)

Arguments

.data

data.frame
.y

Response Variable
.rep

Replication Factor
.gen

Genotypes Factor
.env

Environment Factor
.m

No of PCs retained

Value

Additive ANOVA

References

Singh, R. K. and Chaudhary, B. D. (2004) Biometrical Methods in Quantitative Genetic Analysis. New Delhi: Kalyani.

Examples

data(ge_data)
YieldMASV <-
     stab_masv(
            .data = ge_data
          , .y    = Yield
          , .rep  = Rep
          , .gen  = Gen
          , .env  = Env
          , .m    = 2
      )
YieldMASV
